Justice of Peace Practices

Complete assistance for all practices at the Justice of Peace office

Home > Services > Justice of Peace Practices

Acentro Services offers complete assistance for practices at the Justice of Peace, supporting individuals and professionals in managing all necessary formalities.

Our team of experts handles every procedural aspect, ensuring efficiency and professionalism at every stage.

Civil Case Services

File Preparation

Complete preparation of documentation necessary for initiating civil proceedings at the Justice of Peace.

Document Filing

Service for filing appeals, briefs, and documents with the Justice of Peace registry, with verification of correct receipt.

Payment Order Monitoring

Constant monitoring of payment order status, with timely updates to the client.

Notifications

Complete management of judicial document notification procedures, ensuring compliance with legal terms and methods.

Opposition Services

Administrative Sanctions Opposition

Assistance in preparing and filing appeals against fines and administrative sanctions, with preliminary documentation analysis.

Tax Bill Opposition

Complete support for contesting payment notices issued by collection agencies, with verification of claim legitimacy.

Condominium Disputes

Assistance in managing condominium disputes under the Justice of Peace's jurisdiction, with preparation of necessary documentation.

Preliminary Consultation

We offer a preliminary consultation service to evaluate the feasibility and chances of success for actions to be taken at the Justice of Peace. Our team analyzes available documentation and provides professional advice on the most effective strategies to adopt.

Digital Assistance

Acentro Services also supports clients in digital practice management, offering services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), essential tools for communication with judicial offices.

How Our Service Works

1

Preliminary Analysis

We evaluate the documentation and define the most effective strategy for your case.

2

Documentation Preparation

We prepare all necessary documents according to current regulations.

3

Filing and Notifications

We handle document filing and any necessary notifications.

4

Monitoring and Updates

We follow the practice's evolution and keep you constantly updated.

Benefits of our service

Operational efficiency

Practice management time reduction and streamlining of administrative processes.

Specialized expertise

Our team has specific experience in Justice of Peace procedures.

Constant monitoring

We keep track of your practices' progress with regular updates.

Maximum precision

We ensure correct compilation and timely filing of all necessary documents.

Need assistance with practices at the Justice of Peace?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you effectively manage your legal practices.
